pkgmetadata.longdescription: An Algorithm for Morphometric Characters Selection and Statistical Validation in Morphological Taxonomy // An algorithm (Guisande et al., 2016 doi:10.11646/zootaxa.4162.3.10) which identifies the morphometric features that significantly discriminate two taxa and validates the morphological distinctness between them via a Monte-Carlo test, polar coordinates and overlap of the area under the density curve.
